exclude.name: Spring WS - Base servlet for Spring's web framework
Spring WS - dispatching of Web service messages

health-rule.name: Business Transaction response time is much higher than normal
health-rule.description: Average Response Time (ms) is > 2 : 3 standard deviation of the default baseline and CALLS_PER_MINUTE is > 50 per minute for the last 30 minutes

health-rule.name: Business Transaction error rate is much higher than normal
health-rule.description: Errors per Minute is > 2 : 3 standard deviation of the default baseline and Errors per Minute is > 10 per minute and CALLS_PER_MINUTE is > 50 per minute for the last 30 minutes

health-rule.name: JVM Heap utilization is too high
JVM Garbage Collection Time is too high

policy-condition.display-name: JVM|Garbage Collection|GC Time Spent Per Min (ms) Condition

metric-definition.logical-metric-name: JVM|Garbage Collection|GC Time Spent Per Min (ms)

policy-condition.display-name: JVM|Garbage Collection|GC Time Spent Per Min (ms) Condition

metric-definition.logical-metric-name: JVM|Garbage Collection|GC Time Spent Per Min (ms)

health-rule.name: CLR Garbage Collection Time is too high

property-definition.name: collect-user-data-sync
property-definition.description: Collect user data from diagnostic pojo data collectors synchronously, default value is true, doesn't require restart

property-definition.name: dont-show-packages
property-definition.description: Do not show these packages / class names in addition to the ones configured in the global callgraph configuration, for the callgraphs captured on this node. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: jdbc-callable-statements
property-definition.description: Implementation classes of the java.sql.CallableStatement interface

property-definition.name: find-entry-points
property-definition.description: When there is a chance that not all traffic/no traffic is being detected as business transactions, turn this flag on to log all potential entry points that are hitting instrumented exit points or loggers to the BusinessTransactions log file.

property-definition.name: rest-transaction-naming
property-definition.description: Controls how JAX-RS transactions are named. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: max-business-transactions
property-definition.description: Number of business transactions discovered once an agent is started. This is done to prevent business transaction metric explosion as an unsuitable discovery scheme can potentially produce thousands of transactions, Default value is 50.

property-definition.name: enable-transaction-correlation
property-definition.description: Disable/enable transaction correlation, default value is true, doesn't require restart

property-definition.name: enable-startup-snapshot-policy
property-definition.description: Disable/enable the policy for startup request snapshots which will mean snapshots will be collected for all BTs forall invocations for the first 2 minutes of an application server start. Default value is false.

property-definition.name: enable-default-http-error-code-reporter
property-definition.description: Disable/enable automatic HTTP error code reporting for error codes between 400 - 505, default TRUE.

property-definition.name: downstream-tx-detection-enabled
property-definition.description: If the agent cannot reach the controller for a prolonged period, it turns off most services, and notifies the continuing tiers that upstream transaction was detected and is not being monitored. Defaults to false.Set this to true if you wish the continuing tiers to detect thier own transactions in the event of network failure on the upstream tiers.

property-definition.name: disable-exit-call-correlation-for
property-definition.description: Disable exit call correlation for a specific type i.e HTTP, JMS, RMI. By default all exit call correlation are enabled.

property-definition.name: max-jdbc-calls-per-callgraph
property-definition.description: Maximum number of sql queries that will be reported per callgraph. Note - Only queries taking more time than 'min-duration-for-jdbc-callsample' wil be reported. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: slow-request-threshold
property-definition.description: In flight requests taking more time than this threshold (in ms) and with a deviation greater than 'slow-request-deviation' from the current average response time will be monitored to capture hotspots.

property-definition.name: jdbc-prepared-statements
property-definition.description: Implementation classes of the java.sql.PreparedStatement interface

property-definition.name: rest-uri-segment-scheme
property-definition.description: Segment scheme to process the URI of JAX-RS transactions. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: enable-soap-header-correlation
property-definition.description: Disable/enable web service transaction correlation, default value is false, doesn't require restart

property-definition.name: async-transaction-demarcator
property-definition.description: This Class Name/method name combination marks the end of an async distributed transaction Use the format ClassName/Method Name e.g. foo/bar where foo is class name and bar is method name

property-definition.name: on-demand-snapshots
property-definition.description: Collect snapshots for all business transactions executed in this node. Default value is false. Does not need a restart.

property-definition.name: disable-exit-call-metrics-for
property-definition.description: Disable exit call monitoring for a specific type i.e JDBC, HTTP, JMS, WEB_SERVICE. If set the average data (calls /min, Avg response time for the specific exit call type will not be collected. However on a snapshot all details will be collected. Set this if the app makes a large number of exit calls per transaction and the avg metrics is not important. By default all exit call metrics are enabled.

property-definition.name: minimum-size-for-evaluation-in-mb
property-definition.description: Minimum initial size in mega bytes for a collection to qualify to show up in Automatic Leak Detection tab. The collection must also survive for the period specified in property [minimum-age-for-evaluation-in-minutes]. Default value is 5 MB.

property-definition.name: leak-diagnostic-interval-in-minutes
property-definition.description: Interval at which diagnostic data (content summary and activity trace) will be captured for leaking collections

property-definition.name: rest-num-segments
property-definition.description: Number of segments to be used by rest-uri-segment-scheme. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: enable-collection-monitoring
property-definition.description: Enables / Disables Collection monitoring feature on this node. Feature available only on JVMs versions 1.6 upwards and requires restart.

property-definition.name: enable-json-bci-rules
property-definition.description: set this property to true to enable JSON Byte Code Instrumentation rules 'org.json.JSONObject'.'get/getString', default value is 'true', needs JVM restart.

property-definition.name: slow-request-deviation
property-definition.description: Value (in ms) for the deviation from the current average response time, used for evaluation of slow inflight transactions. Also see 'slow-request-threshold' property for more details.

property-definition.name: log-request-payload
property-definition.description: Turn this on to log request payload(HTTP parameters/cookies/session keys etc) as part of a request snapshot.

property-definition.name: capture-raw-sql
property-definition.description: Capture Raw SQLs for this node. eg. select * from user where ssn = '123-123-1234'

property-definition.name: jdbc-statements
property-definition.description: Implementation classes of the java.sql.Statement interface

property-definition.name: disable-custom-exit-points-for
property-definition.description: Disable Out of the box custom exit points by specifying the type here, e.g. ehcache For multiple, use a comma separated list from the following SAP,Mail,LDAP,MongoDB

property-definition.name: max-jdbc-calls-per-snapshot
property-definition.description: Maximum number of unique sql queries that will be reported per snapshot. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: jdbc-connections
property-definition.description: Implementation classes of the java.sql.Connection interface

property-definition.name: min-duration-for-jdbc-call-in-ms
property-definition.description: JDBC call taking more time than the specified time (in milliseconds) will be captured in Callgraph. The quesry will continue to show up in request snapshot. Setting this value too low (< 10ms) may affect application response times. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: adaptive-callgraph-granularity
property-definition.description: Callgraph granularity based on average response time for the business transaction in last 1 minute. The following distribution is used. Granularity of 10ms for avg response time of <= 10 seconds; 50 ms for 10 to 60 secs; 100 ms for 60 to 600 secs; 200ms for > 600 seconds

property-definition.name: enable-xml-bci-rules
property-definition.description: set this property to true to enable Java XML Binding and DOM Parser Byte Code Instrumentation rules, default value is 'true', needs JVM restart.

property-definition.name: callgraph-granularity-in-ms
property-definition.description: Granularity for call graphs only for this node. The global configuration will be ignored if this is used. The value is ignored if 'adaptive-callgraph-granularity' is set to true. A value of zero (default) implies the global configuration (from Configuration --> Callgraph Settings) will be used. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: minimum-age-for-evaluation-in-minutes
property-definition.description: Minimum age of the collection in minutes to qualify the collection as a Automatic Leak Detection candidate. The property takes effect after node restart.

property-definition.name: show-packages
property-definition.description: Show these packages / class names in addition to the ones configured in the global callgraph configuration, for the callgraphs captured on this node. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: slow-request-monitor-interval
property-definition.description: In flight requests are checked for slowness in intervals (in ms) specified by this property.

property-definition.name: api-thread-activity-timeout-in-seconds
property-definition.description: Timeout value in seconds for threads participating in a global transaction added by appdynamics api. The removeCurrentThread api will be invoked after the specified timeout period. Default value is 10 seconds

property-definition.name: collection-capture-period-in-minutes
property-definition.description: Total interval in minutes since server restart for which collections will be captured for leak evaluation. The property takes effect only after the node restart.

property-definition.name: min-load-per-minute-diagnostic-session-trigger
property-definition.description: Number of requests per Business Transaction to evaluate before triggering a diagnostic session. This is to prevent diagnostic sessions when there is not enough load.

property-definition.name: enable-object-size-monitoring
property-definition.description: Enables / Disables Object Size monitoring feature on this node. Doesn't need a restart for JVM version 1.6 upwards

property-definition.name: api-transaction-timeout-in-seconds
property-definition.description: Timeout value in seconds for global transactions initiated by appdynamics api. The endTransaction api will be invoked after the specified timeout period. Default value is 15 seconds

property-definition.name: capture-error-urls
property-definition.description: Disable/enable capturing the URLs causing HTTP errors. The URLs are reported as ERROR events every 15 minutes, viewable through Event Viewer. Default TRUE. JVM needs restart if re-transformation is not supported for the JVM version.

property-definition.name: end-to-end-message-latency-threshold-millis
property-definition.description: Enable end to end message latency monitoring for distributed asynchronouse systems by setting up a threshold any message taking more than the threshold is viewable through Event Viewer.

property-definition.name: enable-instance-monitoring
property-definition.description: Enables / Disables Instance tracking feature on this node. Doesn't need a JVM restart.

property-definition.name: enable-json-bci-rules
property-definition.description: set this property to true to enable JSON Byte Code Instrumentation rules 'org.json.JSONObject'.'get/getString', default value is 'true', needs JVM restart.

property-definition.description: set this property to true to enable Java XML Binding and DOM Parser Byte Code Instrumentation rules, default value is 'true', needs JVM restart.

property-definition.description: Timeout value in seconds for global transactions initiated by appdynamics api. The endTransaction api will be invoked after the specified timeout period. Default value is 15 seconds

property-definition.description: Do not show these packages / class names in addition to the ones configured in the global callgraph configuration, for the callgraphs captured on this node. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: end-to-end-message-latency-threshold-millis
property-definition.description: Enable end to end message latency monitoring for distributed asynchronouse systems by setting up a threshold any message taking more than the threshold is viewable through Event Viewer.

property-definition.name: enable-startup-snapshot-policy
property-definition.description: Disable/enable the policy for startup request snapshots which will mean snapshots will be collected for all BTs forall invocations for the first 2 minutes of an application server start. Default value is false.

property-definition.name: enable-transaction-correlation
property-definition.description: Disable/enable transaction correlation, default value is true, doesn't require restart

property-definition.name: log-request-payload
property-definition.description: Turn this on to log request payload(HTTP parameters/cookies/session keys etc) as part of a request snapshot.

property-definition.name: enable-object-size-monitoring
property-definition.description: Enables / Disables Object Size monitoring feature on this node. Doesn't need a restart for JVM version 1.6 upwards

property-definition.name: find-entry-points
property-definition.description: When there is a chance that not all traffic/no traffic is being detected as business transactions, turn this flag on to log all potential entry points that are hitting instrumented exit points or loggers to the BusinessTransactions log file.

property-definition.name: enable-soap-header-correlation
property-definition.description: Disable/enable web service transaction correlation, default value is false, doesn't require restart

property-definition.name: enable-json-bci-rules
property-definition.description: set this property to true to enable JSON Byte Code Instrumentation rules 'org.json.JSONObject'.'get/getString', default value is 'true', needs JVM restart.

property-definition.name: jdbc-statements
property-definition.description: Implementation classes of the java.sql.Statement interface

property-definition.name: capture-error-urls
property-definition.description: Disable/enable capturing the URLs causing HTTP errors. The URLs are reported as ERROR events every 15 minutes, viewable through Event Viewer. Default TRUE. JVM needs restart if re-transformation is not supported for the JVM version.

property-definition.name: slow-request-deviation
property-definition.description: Value (in ms) for the deviation from the current average response time, used for evaluation of slow inflight transactions. Also see 'slow-request-threshold' property for more details.

property-definition.name: max-jdbc-calls-per-callgraph
property-definition.description: Maximum number of sql queries that will be reported per callgraph. Note - Only queries taking more time than 'min-duration-for-jdbc-callsample' wil be reported. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: capture-raw-sql
property-definition.description: Capture Raw SQLs for this node. eg. select * from user where ssn = '123-123-1234'

property-definition.name: disable-exit-call-metrics-for
property-definition.description: Disable exit call monitoring for a specific type i.e JDBC, HTTP, JMS, WEB_SERVICE. If set the average data (calls /min, Avg response time for the specific exit call type will not be collected. However on a snapshot all details will be collected. Set this if the app makes a large number of exit calls per transaction and the avg metrics is not important. By default all exit call metrics are enabled.

property-definition.name: find-entry-points
property-definition.description: When there is a chance that not all traffic/no traffic is being detected as business transactions, turn this flag on to log all potential entry points that are hitting instrumented exit points or loggers to the BusinessTransactions log file.

property-definition.name: slow-request-threshold
property-definition.description: In flight requests taking more time than this threshold (in ms) and with a deviation greater than 'slow-request-deviation' from the current average response time will be monitored to capture hotspots.

property-definition.name: enable-instance-monitoring
property-definition.description: Enables / Disables Instance tracking feature on this node. Doesn't need a JVM restart.

property-definition.name: enable-collection-monitoring
property-definition.description: Enables / Disables Collection monitoring feature on this node. Feature available only on JVMs versions 1.6 upwards and requires restart.

property-definition.name: api-thread-activity-timeout-in-seconds
property-definition.description: Timeout value in seconds for threads participating in a global transaction added by appdynamics api. The removeCurrentThread api will be invoked after the specified timeout period. Default value is 10 seconds

property-definition.name: max-jdbc-calls-per-callgraph
property-definition.description: Maximum number of sql queries that will be reported per callgraph. Note - Only queries taking more time than 'min-duration-for-jdbc-callsample' wil be reported. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: jdbc-prepared-statements
property-definition.description: Implementation classes of the java.sql.PreparedStatement interface

property-definition.name: log-request-payload
property-definition.description: Turn this on to log request payload(HTTP parameters/cookies/session keys etc) as part of a request snapshot.

property-definition.name: show-packages
property-definition.description: Show these packages / class names in addition to the ones configured in the global callgraph configuration, for the callgraphs captured on this node. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: slow-request-deviation
property-definition.description: Value (in ms) for the deviation from the current average response time, used for evaluation of slow inflight transactions. Also see 'slow-request-threshold' property for more details.

property-definition.name: rest-num-segments
property-definition.description: Number of segments to be used by rest-uri-segment-scheme. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: max-business-transactions
property-definition.description: Number of business transactions discovered once an agent is started. This is done to prevent business transaction metric explosion as an unsuitable discovery scheme can potentially produce thousands of transactions, Default value is 50.

property-definition.name: adaptive-callgraph-granularity
property-definition.description: Callgraph granularity based on average response time for the business transaction in last 1 minute. The following distribution is used. Granularity of 10ms for avg response time of <= 10 seconds; 50 ms for 10 to 60 secs; 100 ms for 60 to 600 secs; 200ms for > 600 seconds

property-definition.name: slow-request-monitor-interval
property-definition.description: In flight requests are checked for slowness in intervals (in ms) specified by this property.

property-definition.name: minimum-age-for-evaluation-in-minutes
property-definition.description: Minimum age of the collection in minutes to qualify the collection as a Automatic Leak Detection candidate. The property takes effect after node restart.

property-definition.name: rest-uri-segment-scheme
property-definition.description: Segment scheme to process the URI of JAX-RS transactions. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: capture-raw-sql
property-definition.description: Capture Raw SQLs for this node. eg. select * from user where ssn = '123-123-1234'

property-definition.name: rest-transaction-naming
property-definition.description: Controls how JAX-RS transactions are named. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: dont-show-packages
property-definition.description: Do not show these packages / class names in addition to the ones configured in the global callgraph configuration, for the callgraphs captured on this node. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: callgraph-granularity-in-ms
property-definition.description: Granularity for call graphs only for this node. The global configuration will be ignored if this is used. The value is ignored if 'adaptive-callgraph-granularity' is set to true. A value of zero (default) implies the global configuration (from Configuration --> Callgraph Settings) will be used. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: jdbc-connections
property-definition.description: Implementation classes of the java.sql.Connection interface

property-definition.name: enable-object-size-monitoring
property-definition.description: Enables / Disables Object Size monitoring feature on this node. Doesn't need a restart for JVM version 1.6 upwards

property-definition.name: enable-json-bci-rules
property-definition.description: set this property to true to enable JSON Byte Code Instrumentation rules 'org.json.JSONObject'.'get/getString', default value is 'true', needs JVM restart.

property-definition.name: api-transaction-timeout-in-seconds
property-definition.description: Timeout value in seconds for global transactions initiated by appdynamics api. The endTransaction api will be invoked after the specified timeout period. Default value is 15 seconds

property-definition.name: disable-exit-call-correlation-for
property-definition.description: Disable exit call correlation for a specific type i.e HTTP, JMS, RMI. By default all exit call correlation are enabled.

property-definition.name: enable-soap-header-correlation
property-definition.description: Disable/enable web service transaction correlation, default value is false, doesn't require restart

property-definition.name: jdbc-callable-statements
property-definition.description: Implementation classes of the java.sql.CallableStatement interface

property-definition.name: enable-xml-bci-rules
property-definition.description: set this property to true to enable Java XML Binding and DOM Parser Byte Code Instrumentation rules, default value is 'true', needs JVM restart.

property-definition.name: jdbc-statements
property-definition.description: Implementation classes of the java.sql.Statement interface

property-definition.name: enable-startup-snapshot-policy
property-definition.description: Disable/enable the policy for startup request snapshots which will mean snapshots will be collected for all BTs forall invocations for the first 2 minutes of an application server start. Default value is false.

property-definition.name: enable-transaction-correlation
property-definition.description: Disable/enable transaction correlation, default value is true, doesn't require restart

property-definition.name: enable-default-http-error-code-reporter
property-definition.description: Disable/enable automatic HTTP error code reporting for error codes between 400 - 505, default TRUE.

property-definition.name: on-demand-snapshots
property-definition.description: Collect snapshots for all business transactions executed in this node. Default value is false. Does not need a restart.

property-definition.name: async-transaction-demarcator
property-definition.description: This Class Name/method name combination marks the end of an async distributed transaction Use the format ClassName/Method Name e.g. foo/bar where foo is class name and bar is method name

property-definition.name: min-load-per-minute-diagnostic-session-trigger
property-definition.description: Number of requests per Business Transaction to evaluate before triggering a diagnostic session. This is to prevent diagnostic sessions when there is not enough load.

property-definition.name: max-jdbc-calls-per-snapshot
property-definition.description: Maximum number of unique sql queries that will be reported per snapshot. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: disable-custom-exit-points-for
property-definition.description: Disable Out of the box custom exit points by specifying the type here, e.g. ehcache For multiple, use a comma separated list from the following SAP,Mail,LDAP,MongoDB

property-definition.name: collection-capture-period-in-minutes
property-definition.description: Total interval in minutes since server restart for which collections will be captured for leak evaluation. The property takes effect only after the node restart.

property-definition.name: minimum-size-for-evaluation-in-mb
property-definition.description: Minimum initial size in mega bytes for a collection to qualify to show up in Automatic Leak Detection tab. The collection must also survive for the period specified in property [minimum-age-for-evaluation-in-minutes]. Default value is 5 MB.

property-definition.name: leak-diagnostic-interval-in-minutes
property-definition.description: Interval at which diagnostic data (content summary and activity trace) will be captured for leaking collections

property-definition.name: capture-error-urls
property-definition.description: Disable/enable capturing the URLs causing HTTP errors. The URLs are reported as ERROR events every 15 minutes, viewable through Event Viewer. Default TRUE. JVM needs restart if re-transformation is not supported for the JVM version.

property-definition.name: min-duration-for-jdbc-call-in-ms
property-definition.description: JDBC call taking more time than the specified time (in milliseconds) will be captured in Callgraph. The quesry will continue to show up in request snapshot. Setting this value too low (< 10ms) may affect application response times. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: collect-user-data-sync
property-definition.description: Collect user data from diagnostic pojo data collectors synchronously, default value is true, doesn't require restart

property-definition.name: downstream-tx-detection-enabled
property-definition.description: If the agent cannot reach the controller for a prolonged period, it turns off most services, and notifies the continuing tiers that upstream transaction was detected and is not being monitored. Defaults to false.Set this to true if you wish the continuing tiers to detect thier own transactions in the event of network failure on the upstream tiers.

property-definition.name: disable-exit-call-metrics-for
property-definition.description: Disable exit call monitoring for a specific type i.e JDBC, HTTP, JMS, WEB_SERVICE. If set the average data (calls /min, Avg response time for the specific exit call type will not be collected. However on a snapshot all details will be collected. Set this if the app makes a large number of exit calls per transaction and the avg metrics is not important. By default all exit call metrics are enabled.

property-definition.name: jdbc-prepared-statements
property-definition.description: Implementation classes of the java.sql.PreparedStatement interface

property-definition.name: slow-request-deviation
property-definition.description: Value (in ms) for the deviation from the current average response time, used for evaluation of slow inflight transactions. Also see 'slow-request-threshold' property for more details.

property-definition.name: on-demand-snapshots
property-definition.description: Collect snapshots for all business transactions executed in this node. Default value is false. Does not need a restart.

property-definition.name: enable-startup-snapshot-policy
property-definition.description: Disable/enable the policy for startup request snapshots which will mean snapshots will be collected for all BTs forall invocations for the first 2 minutes of an application server start. Default value is false.

property-definition.name: leak-diagnostic-interval-in-minutes
property-definition.description: Interval at which diagnostic data (content summary and activity trace) will be captured for leaking collections

property-definition.name: disable-custom-exit-points-for
property-definition.description: Disable Out of the box custom exit points by specifying the type here, e.g. ehcache For multiple, use a comma separated list from the following SAP,Mail,LDAP,MongoDB

property-definition.name: enable-default-http-error-code-reporter
property-definition.description: Disable/enable automatic HTTP error code reporting for error codes between 400 - 505, default TRUE.

property-definition.name: jdbc-connections
property-definition.description: Implementation classes of the java.sql.Connection interface

property-definition.name: capture-error-urls
property-definition.description: Disable/enable capturing the URLs causing HTTP errors. The URLs are reported as ERROR events every 15 minutes, viewable through Event Viewer. Default TRUE. JVM needs restart if re-transformation is not supported for the JVM version.

property-definition.name: rest-uri-segment-scheme
property-definition.description: Segment scheme to process the URI of JAX-RS transactions. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: enable-transaction-correlation
property-definition.description: Disable/enable transaction correlation, default value is true, doesn't require restart

property-definition.name: enable-xml-bci-rules
property-definition.description: set this property to true to enable Java XML Binding and DOM Parser Byte Code Instrumentation rules, default value is 'true', needs JVM restart.

property-definition.name: disable-exit-call-correlation-for
property-definition.description: Disable exit call correlation for a specific type i.e HTTP, JMS, RMI. By default all exit call correlation are enabled.

property-definition.name: enable-object-size-monitoring
property-definition.description: Enables / Disables Object Size monitoring feature on this node. Doesn't need a restart for JVM version 1.6 upwards

property-definition.name: jdbc-prepared-statements
property-definition.description: Implementation classes of the java.sql.PreparedStatement interface

property-definition.name: max-business-transactions
property-definition.description: Number of business transactions discovered once an agent is started. This is done to prevent business transaction metric explosion as an unsuitable discovery scheme can potentially produce thousands of transactions, Default value is 50.

property-definition.name: async-transaction-demarcator
property-definition.description: This Class Name/method name combination marks the end of an async distributed transaction Use the format ClassName/Method Name e.g. foo/bar where foo is class name and bar is method name

property-definition.name: rest-transaction-naming
property-definition.description: Controls how JAX-RS transactions are named. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: max-jdbc-calls-per-snapshot
property-definition.description: Maximum number of unique sql queries that will be reported per snapshot. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: minimum-size-for-evaluation-in-mb
property-definition.description: Minimum initial size in mega bytes for a collection to qualify to show up in Automatic Leak Detection tab. The collection must also survive for the period specified in property [minimum-age-for-evaluation-in-minutes]. Default value is 5 MB.

property-definition.name: slow-request-threshold
property-definition.description: In flight requests taking more time than this threshold (in ms) and with a deviation greater than 'slow-request-deviation' from the current average response time will be monitored to capture hotspots.

property-definition.name: slow-request-deviation
property-definition.description: Value (in ms) for the deviation from the current average response time, used for evaluation of slow inflight transactions. Also see 'slow-request-threshold' property for more details.

property-definition.name: downstream-tx-detection-enabled
property-definition.description: If the agent cannot reach the controller for a prolonged period, it turns off most services, and notifies the continuing tiers that upstream transaction was detected and is not being monitored. Defaults to false.Set this to true if you wish the continuing tiers to detect thier own transactions in the event of network failure on the upstream tiers.

property-definition.name: jdbc-statements
property-definition.description: Implementation classes of the java.sql.Statement interface

property-definition.name: dont-show-packages
property-definition.description: Do not show these packages / class names in addition to the ones configured in the global callgraph configuration, for the callgraphs captured on this node. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: enable-collection-monitoring
property-definition.description: Enables / Disables Collection monitoring feature on this node. Feature available only on JVMs versions 1.6 upwards and requires restart.

property-definition.name: collection-capture-period-in-minutes
property-definition.description: Total interval in minutes since server restart for which collections will be captured for leak evaluation. The property takes effect only after the node restart.

property-definition.name: minimum-age-for-evaluation-in-minutes
property-definition.description: Minimum age of the collection in minutes to qualify the collection as a Automatic Leak Detection candidate. The property takes effect after node restart.

property-definition.name: on-demand-snapshots
property-definition.description: Collect snapshots for all business transactions executed in this node. Default value is false. Does not need a restart.

property-definition.name: slow-request-monitor-interval
property-definition.description: In flight requests are checked for slowness in intervals (in ms) specified by this property.

property-definition.name: api-transaction-timeout-in-seconds
property-definition.description: Timeout value in seconds for global transactions initiated by appdynamics api. The endTransaction api will be invoked after the specified timeout period. Default value is 15 seconds

property-definition.name: enable-default-http-error-code-reporter
property-definition.description: Disable/enable automatic HTTP error code reporting for error codes between 400 - 505, default TRUE.

property-definition.name: enable-json-bci-rules
property-definition.description: set this property to true to enable JSON Byte Code Instrumentation rules 'org.json.JSONObject'.'get/getString', default value is 'true', needs JVM restart.

property-definition.name: leak-diagnostic-interval-in-minutes
property-definition.description: Interval at which diagnostic data (content summary and activity trace) will be captured for leaking collections

property-definition.name: callgraph-granularity-in-ms
property-definition.description: Granularity for call graphs only for this node. The global configuration will be ignored if this is used. The value is ignored if 'adaptive-callgraph-granularity' is set to true. A value of zero (default) implies the global configuration (from Configuration --> Callgraph Settings) will be used. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: min-load-per-minute-diagnostic-session-trigger
property-definition.description: Number of requests per Business Transaction to evaluate before triggering a diagnostic session. This is to prevent diagnostic sessions when there is not enough load.

property-definition.name: disable-custom-exit-points-for
property-definition.description: Disable Out of the box custom exit points by specifying the type here, e.g. ehcache For multiple, use a comma separated list from the following SAP,Mail,LDAP,MongoDB

property-definition.name: rest-num-segments
property-definition.description: Number of segments to be used by rest-uri-segment-scheme. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: end-to-end-message-latency-threshold-millis
property-definition.description: Enable end to end message latency monitoring for distributed asynchronouse systems by setting up a threshold any message taking more than the threshold is viewable through Event Viewer.

property-definition.name: enable-soap-header-correlation
property-definition.description: Disable/enable web service transaction correlation, default value is false, doesn't require restart

property-definition.name: capture-raw-sql
property-definition.description: Capture Raw SQLs for this node. eg. select * from user where ssn = '123-123-1234'

property-definition.name: disable-exit-call-metrics-for
property-definition.description: Disable exit call monitoring for a specific type i.e JDBC, HTTP, JMS, WEB_SERVICE. If set the average data (calls /min, Avg response time for the specific exit call type will not be collected. However on a snapshot all details will be collected. Set this if the app makes a large number of exit calls per transaction and the avg metrics is not important. By default all exit call metrics are enabled.

property-definition.name: api-thread-activity-timeout-in-seconds
property-definition.description: Timeout value in seconds for threads participating in a global transaction added by appdynamics api. The removeCurrentThread api will be invoked after the specified timeout period. Default value is 10 seconds

property-definition.name: enable-instance-monitoring
property-definition.description: Enables / Disables Instance tracking feature on this node. Doesn't need a JVM restart.

property-definition.name: min-duration-for-jdbc-call-in-ms
property-definition.description: JDBC call taking more time than the specified time (in milliseconds) will be captured in Callgraph. The quesry will continue to show up in request snapshot. Setting this value too low (< 10ms) may affect application response times. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: find-entry-points
property-definition.description: When there is a chance that not all traffic/no traffic is being detected as business transactions, turn this flag on to log all potential entry points that are hitting instrumented exit points or loggers to the BusinessTransactions log file.

property-definition.name: log-request-payload
property-definition.description: Turn this on to log request payload(HTTP parameters/cookies/session keys etc) as part of a request snapshot.

property-definition.name: adaptive-callgraph-granularity
property-definition.description: Callgraph granularity based on average response time for the business transaction in last 1 minute. The following distribution is used. Granularity of 10ms for avg response time of <= 10 seconds; 50 ms for 10 to 60 secs; 100 ms for 60 to 600 secs; 200ms for > 600 seconds

property-definition.name: collect-user-data-sync
property-definition.description: Collect user data from diagnostic pojo data collectors synchronously, default value is true, doesn't require restart

property-definition.name: enable-startup-snapshot-policy
property-definition.description: Disable/enable the policy for startup request snapshots which will mean snapshots will be collected for all BTs forall invocations for the first 2 minutes of an application server start. Default value is false.

property-definition.name: show-packages
property-definition.description: Show these packages / class names in addition to the ones configured in the global callgraph configuration, for the callgraphs captured on this node. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: max-jdbc-calls-per-callgraph
property-definition.description: Maximum number of sql queries that will be reported per callgraph. Note - Only queries taking more time than 'min-duration-for-jdbc-callsample' wil be reported. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: jdbc-callable-statements
property-definition.description: Implementation classes of the java.sql.CallableStatement interface

property-definition.description: Controls how JAX-RS transactions are named. Does not need a restart

property-definition.description: Disable exit call correlation for a specific type i.e HTTP, JMS, RMI. By default all exit call correlation are enabled.

property-definition.name: slow-request-deviation
property-definition.description: Value (in ms) for the deviation from the current average response time, used for evaluation of slow inflight transactions. Also see 'slow-request-threshold' property for more details.

property-definition.name: collect-user-data-sync
property-definition.description: Collect user data from diagnostic pojo data collectors synchronously, default value is true, doesn't require restart

property-definition.name: rest-transaction-naming
property-definition.description: Controls how JAX-RS transactions are named. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: enable-collection-monitoring
property-definition.description: Enables / Disables Collection monitoring feature on this node. Feature available only on JVMs versions 1.6 upwards and requires restart.

property-definition.name: capture-raw-sql
property-definition.description: Capture Raw SQLs for this node. eg. select * from user where ssn = '123-123-1234'

property-definition.name: dont-show-packages
property-definition.description: Do not show these packages / class names in addition to the ones configured in the global callgraph configuration, for the callgraphs captured on this node. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: enable-transaction-correlation
property-definition.description: Disable/enable transaction correlation, default value is true, doesn't require restart

property-definition.name: minimum-age-for-evaluation-in-minutes
property-definition.description: Minimum age of the collection in minutes to qualify the collection as a Automatic Leak Detection candidate. The property takes effect after node restart.

property-definition.name: enable-default-http-error-code-reporter
property-definition.description: Disable/enable automatic HTTP error code reporting for error codes between 400 - 505, default TRUE.

property-definition.name: callgraph-granularity-in-ms
property-definition.description: Granularity for call graphs only for this node. The global configuration will be ignored if this is used. The value is ignored if 'adaptive-callgraph-granularity' is set to true. A value of zero (default) implies the global configuration (from Configuration --> Callgraph Settings) will be used. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: disable-exit-call-correlation-for
property-definition.description: Disable exit call correlation for a specific type i.e HTTP, JMS, RMI. By default all exit call correlation are enabled.

property-definition.name: slow-request-deviation
property-definition.description: Value (in ms) for the deviation from the current average response time, used for evaluation of slow inflight transactions. Also see 'slow-request-threshold' property for more details.

property-definition.name: show-packages
property-definition.description: Show these packages / class names in addition to the ones configured in the global callgraph configuration, for the callgraphs captured on this node. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: min-load-per-minute-diagnostic-session-trigger
property-definition.description: Number of requests per Business Transaction to evaluate before triggering a diagnostic session. This is to prevent diagnostic sessions when there is not enough load.

property-definition.name: enable-json-bci-rules
property-definition.description: set this property to true to enable JSON Byte Code Instrumentation rules 'org.json.JSONObject'.'get/getString', default value is 'true', needs JVM restart.

property-definition.name: jdbc-prepared-statements
property-definition.description: Implementation classes of the java.sql.PreparedStatement interface

property-definition.name: capture-error-urls
property-definition.description: Disable/enable capturing the URLs causing HTTP errors. The URLs are reported as ERROR events every 15 minutes, viewable through Event Viewer. Default TRUE. JVM needs restart if re-transformation is not supported for the JVM version.

property-definition.name: slow-request-threshold
property-definition.description: In flight requests taking more time than this threshold (in ms) and with a deviation greater than 'slow-request-deviation' from the current average response time will be monitored to capture hotspots.

property-definition.name: rest-num-segments
property-definition.description: Number of segments to be used by rest-uri-segment-scheme. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: collection-capture-period-in-minutes
property-definition.description: Total interval in minutes since server restart for which collections will be captured for leak evaluation. The property takes effect only after the node restart.

property-definition.name: leak-diagnostic-interval-in-minutes
property-definition.description: Interval at which diagnostic data (content summary and activity trace) will be captured for leaking collections

property-definition.name: adaptive-callgraph-granularity
property-definition.description: Callgraph granularity based on average response time for the business transaction in last 1 minute. The following distribution is used. Granularity of 10ms for avg response time of <= 10 seconds; 50 ms for 10 to 60 secs; 100 ms for 60 to 600 secs; 200ms for > 600 seconds

property-definition.name: rest-transaction-naming
property-definition.description: Controls how JAX-RS transactions are named. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: enable-soap-header-correlation
property-definition.description: Disable/enable web service transaction correlation, default value is false, doesn't require restart

property-definition.name: api-transaction-timeout-in-seconds
property-definition.description: Timeout value in seconds for global transactions initiated by appdynamics api. The endTransaction api will be invoked after the specified timeout period. Default value is 15 seconds

property-definition.name: minimum-size-for-evaluation-in-mb
property-definition.description: Minimum initial size in mega bytes for a collection to qualify to show up in Automatic Leak Detection tab. The collection must also survive for the period specified in property [minimum-age-for-evaluation-in-minutes]. Default value is 5 MB.

property-definition.name: enable-xml-bci-rules
property-definition.description: set this property to true to enable Java XML Binding and DOM Parser Byte Code Instrumentation rules, default value is 'true', needs JVM restart.

property-definition.name: enable-instance-monitoring
property-definition.description: Enables / Disables Instance tracking feature on this node. Doesn't need a JVM restart.

property-definition.name: jdbc-callable-statements
property-definition.description: Implementation classes of the java.sql.CallableStatement interface

property-definition.name: jdbc-connections
property-definition.description: Implementation classes of the java.sql.Connection interface

property-definition.name: collect-user-data-sync
property-definition.description: Collect user data from diagnostic pojo data collectors synchronously, default value is true, doesn't require restart

property-definition.name: disable-exit-call-metrics-for
property-definition.description: Disable exit call monitoring for a specific type i.e JDBC, HTTP, JMS, WEB_SERVICE. If set the average data (calls /min, Avg response time for the specific exit call type will not be collected. However on a snapshot all details will be collected. Set this if the app makes a large number of exit calls per transaction and the avg metrics is not important. By default all exit call metrics are enabled.

property-definition.name: max-business-transactions
property-definition.description: Number of business transactions discovered once an agent is started. This is done to prevent business transaction metric explosion as an unsuitable discovery scheme can potentially produce thousands of transactions, Default value is 50.

property-definition.name: downstream-tx-detection-enabled
property-definition.description: If the agent cannot reach the controller for a prolonged period, it turns off most services, and notifies the continuing tiers that upstream transaction was detected and is not being monitored. Defaults to false.Set this to true if you wish the continuing tiers to detect thier own transactions in the event of network failure on the upstream tiers.

property-definition.name: rest-uri-segment-scheme
property-definition.description: Segment scheme to process the URI of JAX-RS transactions. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: max-jdbc-calls-per-snapshot
property-definition.description: Maximum number of unique sql queries that will be reported per snapshot. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: api-thread-activity-timeout-in-seconds
property-definition.description: Timeout value in seconds for threads participating in a global transaction added by appdynamics api. The removeCurrentThread api will be invoked after the specified timeout period. Default value is 10 seconds

property-definition.name: enable-collection-monitoring
property-definition.description: Enables / Disables Collection monitoring feature on this node. Feature available only on JVMs versions 1.6 upwards and requires restart.

property-definition.name: enable-startup-snapshot-policy
property-definition.description: Disable/enable the policy for startup request snapshots which will mean snapshots will be collected for all BTs forall invocations for the first 2 minutes of an application server start. Default value is false.

property-definition.name: async-transaction-demarcator
property-definition.description: This Class Name/method name combination marks the end of an async distributed transaction Use the format ClassName/Method Name e.g. foo/bar where foo is class name and bar is method name

property-definition.name: log-request-payload
property-definition.description: Turn this on to log request payload(HTTP parameters/cookies/session keys etc) as part of a request snapshot.

property-definition.name: jdbc-statements
property-definition.description: Implementation classes of the java.sql.Statement interface

property-definition.name: disable-custom-exit-points-for
property-definition.description: Disable Out of the box custom exit points by specifying the type here, e.g. ehcache For multiple, use a comma separated list from the following SAP,Mail,LDAP,MongoDB

property-definition.name: enable-object-size-monitoring
property-definition.description: Enables / Disables Object Size monitoring feature on this node. Doesn't need a restart for JVM version 1.6 upwards

property-definition.description: Maximum number of sql queries that will be reported per callgraph. Note - Only queries taking more time than 'min-duration-for-jdbc-callsample' wil be reported. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: slow-request-monitor-interval
property-definition.description: In flight requests are checked for slowness in intervals (in ms) specified by this property.

property-definition.description: Disable/enable automatic HTTP error code reporting for error codes between 400 - 505, default TRUE.

property-definition.name: on-demand-snapshots
property-definition.description: Collect snapshots for all business transactions executed in this node. Default value is false. Does not need a restart.

property-definition.name: max-jdbc-calls-per-callgraph
property-definition.description: Maximum number of sql queries that will be reported per callgraph. Note - Only queries taking more time than 'min-duration-for-jdbc-callsample' wil be reported. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: jdbc-connections
property-definition.description: Implementation classes of the java.sql.Connection interface

property-definition.name: capture-error-urls
property-definition.description: Disable/enable capturing the URLs causing HTTP errors. The URLs are reported as ERROR events every 15 minutes, viewable through Event Viewer. Default TRUE. JVM needs restart if re-transformation is not supported for the JVM version.

property-definition.name: async-transaction-demarcator
property-definition.description: This Class Name/method name combination marks the end of an async distributed transaction Use the format ClassName/Method Name e.g. foo/bar where foo is class name and bar is method name

property-definition.name: enable-instance-monitoring
property-definition.description: Enables / Disables Instance tracking feature on this node. Doesn't need a JVM restart.

property-definition.name: rest-uri-segment-scheme
property-definition.description: Segment scheme to process the URI of JAX-RS transactions. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: capture-raw-sql
property-definition.description: Capture Raw SQLs for this node. eg. select * from user where ssn = '123-123-1234'

property-definition.name: disable-exit-call-correlation-for
property-definition.description: Disable exit call correlation for a specific type i.e HTTP, JMS, RMI. By default all exit call correlation are enabled.

property-definition.name: enable-startup-snapshot-policy
property-definition.description: Disable/enable the policy for startup request snapshots which will mean snapshots will be collected for all BTs forall invocations for the first 2 minutes of an application server start. Default value is false.

property-definition.name: enable-soap-header-correlation
property-definition.description: Disable/enable web service transaction correlation, default value is false, doesn't require restart

property-definition.name: dont-show-packages
property-definition.description: Do not show these packages / class names in addition to the ones configured in the global callgraph configuration, for the callgraphs captured on this node. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: slow-request-threshold
property-definition.description: In flight requests taking more time than this threshold (in ms) and with a deviation greater than 'slow-request-deviation' from the current average response time will be monitored to capture hotspots.

property-definition.name: minimum-age-for-evaluation-in-minutes
property-definition.description: Minimum age of the collection in minutes to qualify the collection as a Automatic Leak Detection candidate. The property takes effect after node restart.

property-definition.name: enable-xml-bci-rules
property-definition.description: set this property to true to enable Java XML Binding and DOM Parser Byte Code Instrumentation rules, default value is 'true', needs JVM restart.

property-definition.name: callgraph-granularity-in-ms
property-definition.description: Granularity for call graphs only for this node. The global configuration will be ignored if this is used. The value is ignored if 'adaptive-callgraph-granularity' is set to true. A value of zero (default) implies the global configuration (from Configuration --> Callgraph Settings) will be used. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: show-packages
property-definition.description: Show these packages / class names in addition to the ones configured in the global callgraph configuration, for the callgraphs captured on this node. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: api-transaction-timeout-in-seconds
property-definition.description: Timeout value in seconds for global transactions initiated by appdynamics api. The endTransaction api will be invoked after the specified timeout period. Default value is 15 seconds

property-definition.name: collect-user-data-sync
property-definition.description: Collect user data from diagnostic pojo data collectors synchronously, default value is true, doesn't require restart

property-definition.name: enable-transaction-correlation
property-definition.description: Disable/enable transaction correlation, default value is true, doesn't require restart

property-definition.name: enable-json-bci-rules
property-definition.description: set this property to true to enable JSON Byte Code Instrumentation rules 'org.json.JSONObject'.'get/getString', default value is 'true', needs JVM restart.

property-definition.name: slow-request-deviation
property-definition.description: Value (in ms) for the deviation from the current average response time, used for evaluation of slow inflight transactions. Also see 'slow-request-threshold' property for more details.

property-definition.name: min-duration-for-jdbc-call-in-ms
property-definition.description: JDBC call taking more time than the specified time (in milliseconds) will be captured in Callgraph. The quesry will continue to show up in request snapshot. Setting this value too low (< 10ms) may affect application response times. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: leak-diagnostic-interval-in-minutes
property-definition.description: Interval at which diagnostic data (content summary and activity trace) will be captured for leaking collections

property-definition.name: adaptive-callgraph-granularity
property-definition.description: Callgraph granularity based on average response time for the business transaction in last 1 minute. The following distribution is used. Granularity of 10ms for avg response time of <= 10 seconds; 50 ms for 10 to 60 secs; 100 ms for 60 to 600 secs; 200ms for > 600 seconds

property-definition.name: max-business-transactions
property-definition.description: Number of business transactions discovered once an agent is started. This is done to prevent business transaction metric explosion as an unsuitable discovery scheme can potentially produce thousands of transactions, Default value is 50.

property-definition.name: downstream-tx-detection-enabled
property-definition.description: If the agent cannot reach the controller for a prolonged period, it turns off most services, and notifies the continuing tiers that upstream transaction was detected and is not being monitored. Defaults to false.Set this to true if you wish the continuing tiers to detect thier own transactions in the event of network failure on the upstream tiers.

property-definition.name: collection-capture-period-in-minutes
property-definition.description: Total interval in minutes since server restart for which collections will be captured for leak evaluation. The property takes effect only after the node restart.

property-definition.name: minimum-size-for-evaluation-in-mb
property-definition.description: Minimum initial size in mega bytes for a collection to qualify to show up in Automatic Leak Detection tab. The collection must also survive for the period specified in property [minimum-age-for-evaluation-in-minutes]. Default value is 5 MB.

property-definition.name: api-thread-activity-timeout-in-seconds
property-definition.description: Timeout value in seconds for threads participating in a global transaction added by appdynamics api. The removeCurrentThread api will be invoked after the specified timeout period. Default value is 10 seconds

property-definition.name: enable-object-size-monitoring
property-definition.description: Enables / Disables Object Size monitoring feature on this node. Doesn't need a restart for JVM version 1.6 upwards

property-definition.name: jdbc-statements
property-definition.description: Implementation classes of the java.sql.Statement interface

property-definition.name: jdbc-callable-statements
property-definition.description: Implementation classes of the java.sql.CallableStatement interface

property-definition.name: find-entry-points
property-definition.description: When there is a chance that not all traffic/no traffic is being detected as business transactions, turn this flag on to log all potential entry points that are hitting instrumented exit points or loggers to the BusinessTransactions log file.

property-definition.name: end-to-end-message-latency-threshold-millis
property-definition.description: Enable end to end message latency monitoring for distributed asynchronouse systems by setting up a threshold any message taking more than the threshold is viewable through Event Viewer.

property-definition.name: jdbc-prepared-statements
property-definition.description: Implementation classes of the java.sql.PreparedStatement interface

property-definition.name: slow-request-monitor-interval
property-definition.description: In flight requests are checked for slowness in intervals (in ms) specified by this property.

property-definition.name: max-jdbc-calls-per-snapshot
property-definition.description: Maximum number of unique sql queries that will be reported per snapshot. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: enable-collection-monitoring
property-definition.description: Enables / Disables Collection monitoring feature on this node. Feature available only on JVMs versions 1.6 upwards and requires restart.

property-definition.name: min-load-per-minute-diagnostic-session-trigger
property-definition.description: Number of requests per Business Transaction to evaluate before triggering a diagnostic session. This is to prevent diagnostic sessions when there is not enough load.

property-definition.name: log-request-payload
property-definition.description: Turn this on to log request payload(HTTP parameters/cookies/session keys etc) as part of a request snapshot.

property-definition.name: rest-transaction-naming
property-definition.description: Controls how JAX-RS transactions are named. Does not need a restart

property-definition.name: disable-exit-call-metrics-for
property-definition.description: Disable exit call monitoring for a specific type i.e JDBC, HTTP, JMS, WEB_SERVICE. If set the average data (calls /min, Avg response time for the specific exit call type will not be collected. However on a snapshot all details will be collected. Set this if the app makes a large number of exit calls per transaction and the avg metrics is not important. By default all exit call metrics are enabled.

property-definition.name: disable-custom-exit-points-for
property-definition.description: Disable Out of the box custom exit points by specifying the type here, e.g. ehcache For multiple, use a comma separated list from the following SAP,Mail,LDAP,MongoDB

property-definition.name: enable-default-http-error-code-reporter
property-definition.description: Disable/enable automatic HTTP error code reporting for error codes between 400 - 505, default TRUE.

property-definition.name: rest-num-segments
property-definition.description: Number of segments to be used by rest-uri-segment-scheme. Does not need a restart
